description: Coupled ocean-atmosphere transient experiment.  Coupled model extended simulation constrained with present day sea ice.   Present day and future sea ice to be the same as used in experiment pdSST-futArcSIC (1.6).  It is recommended to constrain sea ice by nudging but with a weak relaxation timescale of 2 months. However, appropriately calibrated long-wave fluxes applied to the sea ice model may also be used.  Radiative forcing to be set to present day (year 2000) levels. Initial conditions for coupled model experiments to be taken from year 2000 of coupled model historical simulations.
long_name: Partially-coupled extended simulation with future Arctic SIC
rationale: Investigate the decadal and longer timescale response to Arctic sea ice.

However, appropriately calibrated long-wave fluxes applied to the sea ice model may also be used.
